QuestData.Title: Maatparm Mushroom Menagerie
QuestData.Description: Did you know mushroom hunting is far more dangerous than mushroom consumption? Mushroom hunters expose themselves to many unknowns - not including potential wildlife dangers!$B$BWhat would life be without a little danger? I am in need of mushrooms for my collection. Scattered throughout these unexplored wilds you will find four different types: An aquatic stinkhorn, a blood mushroom, a ruinous polyspore, and a fel cone fungus. They are each unique to various regions in Bloodmyst. Bring them to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Maatparm at Blood Watch wants 1 Aquatic Stinkhorn, 1 Blood Mushroom, 1 Ruinous Polyspore, and 1 Fel Cone Fungus.
QuestData.CompletionText: Remember, the mushrooms I requested are each unique to the different environments of Bloodmyst.
QuestData.RewardText: Well, I did warn you - did I not? Hopefully this payment more than makes up for the mild discomfort that you may have suffered. Return to me when you have gained strength and perhaps I will have another job for you - mushrooms of course!
